text.english: Have mercy on me, O LORD, for I am weak; O LORD, heal me, for my bones are troubled. Have mercy on me, O LORD, for I am weak; O LORD, heal me, for my bones are troubled. My soul also is greatly troubled; But You, O LORD--how long?
text.arabic: ارْحَمْنِي يَا رَبُّ لأَنِّي ضَعِيفٌ. اشْفِنِي يَا رَبُّ لأَنَّ عِظَامِي قَدْ رَجَفَتْ لأَنِّي لَكَ يَا رَبُّ صَبِرْتُ أَنْتَ تَسْتَجِيبُ يَا رَبُّ إِلَهِي.
